}}{{TIDTOC|embedded}} ==Overview== {{FCC ST|09/10/2018|indexme.}}
:Mentioned as "Coming Soon" in the image at the top of :the [https://www.zyxel.com/us/en/promotions/promotion_20161020_999854_us_en.shtml promotion page for the WAP6405] from 10/20/2016.
*"45-403-000514" is silkscreened on the board with the QT3860BC :and the RTL8192EE in the FCC photos. *"45-403-000513" is silkscreened on the board with the QT3840BC :and the RTL8367RB in the FCC photos.
==See Also== * [[List of Tri-Band Wireless Devices]]
